Texts.Chs: 我已经打开了你的连线工具。^green;连线工具允许您将不同的物件连接到一起。
Texts.Eng: I have switched on your Wire Tool. ^green;The Wire Tool allows you to wire together various objects. I can enable it for you.

Texts.Chs: 连线工具允许您将不同的物件连接到一起。我可以为你开启它。
Texts.Eng: The Wire Tool allows you to wire together various objects. I can enable it for you.
